card_text: Target 1 "Utopic Future" Xyz Monster you control; apply the following effect(s) to that monster you control for the rest of this turn.$N●It can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.$N●If it battles an opponent's monster, that monster's effects are negated during the Damage Step only.$N●Each time it destroys an opponent's monster by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK.$NYou can only activate 1 "Future Drive" per turn.
